pr_title: fix: Binding operations can be instantiated

timeline.bodyText: nit, I think namespace is set to test by default even when you use server.getClient(). Is this inNamespace(..) call required?
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText:
Not needed at all. I took the test preparation boiler-plate from the PodTest suite and didn't even check this method.
👍 Removing it.
replies.author: manusa

timeline.message: fix: Binding operations can be instantiated
